Verses: 1 yoodharukkulle Adhigaariyaana Nikkodhemu Ennappatta Pariseyan Oruvan Irundhaan.

2 avan Raakkaalaththile Yesuvinidaththil Vandhu: Rabee, Neer Dhevanidaththilirundhu Vandha Podhagar Endru Arindhirukkirom, Enenil Oruvanum Thannudane Dhevan Iraavittaal Neer Seygira Ippadippatta Arpudhangalai Seyyamaattaan Endraan.
3 yesu Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Oruvan Marupadiyum Piravaavittaal Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaik Kaanamaattaan Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Unakku Sollugiren Endraar.
4 adharku Nikkodhemu: Oru Manushan Mudhirvayadhaayirukkaiyil Eppadip Pirappaan? Avan Than Thaayin Karppaththil Irandaandharam Pravesiththup Pirakkakkoodumo Endraan.
5 yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Oruvan Jalaththinaalum Aaviyinaalum Piravaavittaal Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Pravesikkamaattaan Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Unakku Sollugiren.
6 maamsaththinaal Pirappadhu Maamsamaayirukkum, Aaviyinaal Pirappadhu Aavyaayirukkum.
7 neengal Marupadiyum Pirakkavendumendru Naan Unakku Sonnadhaik Kuriththu Adhisayappadavendaam.

8 kaatraanadhu Thanakku Ishtamaana Idaththile Veesugiradhu, Adhin Saththaththaik Ketkiraai, Aagilum Adhu Inna Idaththilirundhu Varugiradhendrum, Inna Idaththukkup Pogiradhendrum Unakkuth Theriyaadhu; Aaviyinaal Pirandhavanevano Avanum Appadiye Irukkiraan Endraar.
9 adharku Nikkodhemu: Ivaigal Eppadi Aagum Endraan.
10 yesu Avanai Nokki: Nee Isravelil Podhaganaayirundhum Ivaigalai Ariyaamalirukkiraayaa?
11 meyyaagave Meyyaagave Naan Unakku Sollugiren, Naangal Arindhirukkiradhai Solli, Naangal Kandadhaikkuriththu Saatchikodukkirom, Neengalo Engal Saatchiyai Etrukkollugiradhillai.
12 boomikkaduththa Kaariyangalai Naan Ungalukku Solliyum Neengal Visuvaasikkavillaiye, Paramakaariyangalai Ungalukku Solvenaanaal Eppadi Visuvaasippeergal?
13 paralogaththilirundhiranginavarum Paralogaththilirukkiravarumaana Manushakumaaraneyallaamal Paralogaththukku Erinavan Oruvanumillai.
14 sarppamaanadhu Moseyinaal Vanaandharaththile Uyarththappattadhu Pola Manushakumaaranum,
15 thannai Visuvaasikkiravan Evano Avan Kettuppogaamal Niththiya Jeevanai Adaiyumpadikku, Uyarththappadavendum.
16 dhevan, Thammudaiya Oreperaana Kumaaranai Visuvaasikkiravan Evano Avan Kettuppogaamal Niththiyajeevanai Adaiyumpadikku, Avaraith Thandharuli, Ivvalavaai Ulagaththil Anbukoorndhaar.
17 ulagaththai Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerkkumpadi Dhevan Thammudaiya Kumaaranai Ulagaththil Anuppaamal, Avaraale Ulagam Ratchikkappaduvadharkaagave Avarai Anuppinaar.

18 avarai Visuvaasikkiravan Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerkkappadaan; Visuvaasiyaadhavano Dhevanudaiya Oreperaana Kumaaranudaiya Naamaththil Visuvaasamullavanaayiraadhapadiyinaal, Avan Aakkinaiththeerppukkutpattaayitru.

19 oliyaanadhu Ulagaththile Vandhirundhum Manusharudaiya Kiriyaigal Pollaadhavaigalaayirukkirapadiyinaal Avargal Oliyaippaarkkilum Irulai Virumbugiradhe Andha Aakkinaiththeerppukkuk Kaaranamaayirukkiradhu.
20 pollaangu Seygira Evanum Oliyaip Pagaikkiraan, Than Kiriyaigal Kandikkappadaadhapadikku, Oliyinidaththil Varaadhirukkiraan.
21 saththiyaththinpadi Seygiravano Than Kiriyaigal Dhevanukkullaai Seyyappadugiradhendru Veliyaagumpadikku, Oliyinidaththil Varugiraan Endraar.
22 ivaigalukkuppinbu, Yesuvum Avarudaiya Seesharum Yoodheyaa Dhesaththirku Vandhaargal; Ange Avar Avargalode Sanjariththu, Gnaanasnaanankoduththuvandhaar.
23 saalim Oorukku Sameebamaana Ayinon Ennum Idaththile Thanneer Migudhiyaayirundhapadiyinaal, Yovaanum Ange Gnaanasnaanankoduththuvandhaan; Janangal Avanidaththil Vandhu Gnaanasnaanam Petraargal.
24 akkaalaththil Yovaan Kaavalil Vaikkappattirukkavillai.
25 appozhudhu Yovaanudaiya Seesharil Silarukkum Yoodharukkum Suththigarippaik Kuriththu Vaakkuvaadhamundaayitru.

26 avargal Yovaanidaththil Vandhu: Rabee, Ummudanekooda Yordhaanukku Akkaraiyil Oruvar Irundhaare; Avaraik Kuriththu Neerum Saatchikoduththeere, Idho, Avar Gnaanasnaanankodukkiraar, Ellaarum Avaridaththil Pogiraargal Endraargal.
27 yovaan Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Paralogaththilirundhu Oruvanukkuk Kodukkappattaalozhiya, Avan Ondraiyum Petrukkollamaattaan.
28 naan Kristhuvalla, Avarukku Munnaaga Anuppappattavan Endru Naan Sonnadharku Neengale Saatchigal.

29 manavaattiyai Udaiyavane Manavaalan; Manavaalanudaiya Thozhano Aruge Nindru, Avarudaiya Sollaik Ketkiravanaai Manavaalanudaiya Saththaththaik Kuriththu Migavum Sandhoshappadugiraan; Indha Sandhosham Ippozhudhu Enakku Sambooranamaayitru.
30 avar Perugavum Naan Sirugavum Vendum.

31 unnadhaththilirundhu Varugiravar Ellaarilum Melaanavar; Boomiyilirundhundaanavan Boomiyin Thanmaiyullavanaayirundhu, Boomikkaduththavaigalaip Pesugiraan; Paralogaththilirundhu Varugiravar Ellaarilum Melaanavar.
32 thaam Kandadhaiyum Kettadhaiyum Saatchiyaaga Sollugiraar; Avarudaiya Saatchiyai Oruvanum Etrukkollugiradhillai.
33 avarudaiya Saatchiyai Etrukkolgiravan Dhevan Saththiyamullavarendru Muththiraipottu Nichchayappaduththugiraan.
34 dhevanaal Anuppappattavar Dhevanudaiya Vaarththaigalaip Pesugiraar, Dhevan Avarukkuth Thamadhu Aaviyai Alavillaamal Koduththirukkiraar.
35 pidhaavaanavar Kumaaranil Anbaayirundhu Ellaavatraiyum Avar Kaiyil Oppukkoduththirukkiraar.
36 kumaaranidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravan Niththiyajeevanai Udaiyavanaayirukkiraan; Kumaaranai Visuvaasiyaadhavano Jeevanaik Kaanbadhillai, Dhevanudaiya Kobam Avanmel Nilainirkum Endraar.
